description.value:
Age. Hollows reach adulthood in their late teens and then become ageless. However, certain events may occur that trigger the onset of their agelessness earlier than normal.

Ageless. At a certain point, you do not age, and effects that would cause you to age do not work on you.

Creature Type. You are Undead.

Size. Your size is Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this species.

Speed. Your Speed is 30 feet.

Cling to Existance. When you make a death saving throw and roll 16 or higher, you regain 1 Hit Point.

Deathless Nature. You are neither truly dead nor alive, a fact represented by the following benefits:

  • You have Advantage on saving throws made against harmful gases and vapors (such as @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCloudkill0]{Cloudkill} and @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplStinkingCl]{Stinking Cloud} effects, inhaled Poisons, and the Breath Weapons of some dragons).
  • You have Advantage on death saving throws.
  • You do not need to eat, drink, or breathe.
  • You do not need to sleep, and magic can not put you to sleep.

Hollowfication. When you are stabilized or regain any amount of Hit Points while at 0 Hit Points, you can expend one Hit Die and regain additional Hit Points. Hit Points gained in this way are increased by your Proficiency Bonus.

Revenance. As your nature blurs the lines of life and undeath, spells that preserve life that do not normally affect undead, work on you.

Furthermore, you are immune against any effect the turns undead.

Stillness in Sleep. You can finish a Long Rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in an inactive, motionless state, during which you retain consciousness.

Unsettling Presence. As a Magic action, you can unsettle a creature you can see within 15 feet of you. The target has Disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes within the next minute. Constructs, undead, and creatures that cannot be &Reference[Frightened apply=false] are Immune to this feature. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

advancement.title: INT Bonus
advancement.hint: Core rule that provides a bonus based on character level and intelligence modifier at levels 6, 12, 18.  Does NOT apply retroactively and is not affected by temporary changes in Intelligence stat (from items or other buffs/debuffs).
